# addressFilter

**Interface Property**

An address filter that lists which address components to include or exclude in search results.

## Declaration

```swift
addressFilter?: AddressFilter;
```

## Address filtering

- **includeAddresses**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the search results include addresses.
